manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About us Smooth contoured linescharming flared anglesinnovative shapes and stylesdistinctive patterns All above characterize our Lillian Tablesettings line of heavyweight disposables, created for sophistication and grace. Take note of the beautiful and convenient servingware, uniquely styled drinkware, 3-ply napkins and enchanting mini dishes that complete this fine line of upscale disposables. Showcased in eye-catching, elegant packaging, this array of products will captivate any consumer looking for a premium set of dinnerware.
Tablecovers Party Cups Coffee / Tea Cups Paper Plates Aluminum Pans Avialble in Multiple Options ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for daily, light duty use
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with this set for the price. A ton of plasticware for a home that uses it decently often. It is a little less sturdy than most brands you might find in the store but as long as you aren't trying to peel a cantaloupe or cut through an ice cream cake fresh out of the freezer you will likely not have issues. This set will get you through 100 bowls of cereal, 100 plates of cake and 100 cans of wet cat food serving because I don't use plastic knives much so that is their place in life now. They are mostly transparent and are sorted by model of utensil in the box which is nice to keep them organized and simple to grab.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Spend a little more to get a stronger product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheapest Plastic Cutlery—Safety Issue to Use
reviews.reviewText: These were by far the cheapest plastic cutlery we have ever purchased and it is also dangerous to use. When attempting to cut thinly sliced boneless chicken on two occasions three of the prongs snapped off with pieces in the meat that I put in my mouth and almost swallowed. These are completely unsafe and it is disgraceful for Amazon to sell this product let alone to sell it and with the entirely false and misleading marketing. Amazon has received snd posted countless reviews substantiating my review and some even have pictures and/or videos which are clear corroboration for Amazon.When I called Amazon to complain and to warn them I was not aware of their complicity in this matter. As I spoke to the customer service representative to tell her to flag this product for safety reasons I began to scroll down the page and noted this evidence of Amazon’s proactive partnership in this consumer safety product fraud. To wit, the overall rating of the product on 12/09/2022!when we made our first purchase was as follows: Overall Rating 4.0 stars out of 5 Customer reviews 3.9 stars out of 5 By Feature (all rated out of 5 stars) Light Weight 3.9 (likely due to flimsy product materials used to manufacture) Sheerness 2.5 Value for money 2.3 Durability 1.9 Sturdiness 1.8When doing simple addition and division to come out with an average rating the customer feature reviews come out to an average rating of 2.4 NOTHING CLOSE TO THE 3.9 Customer Reviews’ Average ListedAnd definitely not close to the higher overall rating of 4.0 which is what many Amazon customers rely to use when selecting products.In this case, the cheapest, most flexible and easiest to snap (literally when using a fork as I did with nice thin sliced chicken I can snd have used the dull edge of a knife or spoon if only cutlery that was available to me. Although I hope no one has been hurt or required CPR from unknowingly swallowing a prong of one of these forks, it is a matter that may legally involve Amazon in any lawsuit. As it stands, Amazon may have violated consumer fraud laws in some states—happy potential class action lawsuit defense.By not posting this review or censoring it, Amazon may be conceding liability. And no, I am not suing Amazon but rather doing what they should have done upon receipt of information that should have resulted in an investigation to determine the safety or danger of these products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the Job done
reviews.reviewText: I recently had surgery to my wrist and am not able to do much , especially wash dishes for a while. I purchased these just for my use at home. They are study enough for my use. They are a little on the smaller side but again, gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very sturdy and small
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to purchase disposable plasticware for meal prepping to bring to work. These are not ideal. They are very small and pretty flimsy. It works, but I'd rather have something a bit larger and more sturdy. I'd probably reccomend these for a young childs birthday party or something but not much else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars decent deal, break easily
reviews.reviewText: I mean they’re plastic but I’ve encountered stronger plastic silverware, these snapped when I press to hard but the easy cleanup makes it worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A very good product.
reviews.reviewText: These items are sturdy and durable. I’ve ordered them twice before and I’ve never been disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are not worth buying. They are not sturdy, very small and quality is poor
THEY COME IN A DIVIDED BOX

Me encantaron estos cubiertos! se me hace muy practico comprar la caja donde ya vengan todos los cuchilos, tenedores y cucharas y no tener que comprarlos por separado, a parte por el precio de oferta que me toco quede encantanda!
En relación el precio está excelente pero la verdad me gustan más lo de Amazon solo que son más caros
